solution_line_template: Paula will have a total of {initial_candies} + {additional_candies} = <<{initial_candies}+{additional_candies}={total_candies}>>{total_candies} candies.
Thus, each of her friends will receive {total_candies}/{num_friends} = <<{total_candies}/{num_friends}={candies_per_friend}>>{candies_per_friend} candies.
